descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/s4hPh6h.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EQIusfO.jpg[/img]
[b]The Eldamar[/b] was once a grand palace for the [b]The Snow Elves[/b] before they were driven underground. The palace lies in ruins on the surface, However its roots run deep into the tainted earth below. It lies in a hill to the side of Azuras Statue. "Arftulzurand"

(MAP MARKER INCLUDED-SHOWS AS A DWARVERN RUIN!!!)

-THIS ADDS-
A whole new location known as The Eldamar which consists of an exterior ruin which then dives into the icy depths to reveal the forgotten past of the snow elves who once resided there!
A new quest (WiP)
A New Playerhome (WiP)



THIS REQUIRES
--------------------
ALL OF SKYRIMS DLC!!!!!
[b]This mod/Addon will be adapted over time so this is not the final product!!!...
[/b]
[b] IN ALPHA STATE CURRENTLY

This mod was uploaded by myself a few months back! After a good reception from the community I decided to put together a team and make this mod bigger! It is now more performance friendly and is even more enjoyable!

We will continue to update this as it is WiP 

Some areas are unfinished but this is a taster of good things to come!
[/b]
[b]Please Give a Rate and Subscribe!!!!! enjoy![/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CONWilF.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/SPBg9zd.jpg[/img]
author: IADAMZX Mod Team
